verses.verse: Now on the <S%G1161><s%> first <S%G1520><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> went <S%G2064><s%> early, <S%G4404><s%> while it was <S%G5607><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> dark, <S%G4653><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G991><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> taken away <S%G142><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> she ran <S%G5143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved, <S%G5368><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "They have taken away <S%G142><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the tomb, <S%G3419><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we don't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> they have laid <S%G5087><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G2064><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> the tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

They <S%G1161><s%> both <S%G1417><s%> ran <S%G5143><s%> together. <S%G3674><s%> The <S%G2532><s%> other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> outran <S%G4390><s%> <S%G99999><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the tomb <S%G3419><s%> first. <S%G4413><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Stooping <S%G3879><s%> and looking in, <S%G991><s%> he saw the linen cloths <S%G3608><s%> lying, <S%G2749><s%> yet <S%G3305><s%> he <S%G1525><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> enter in. <S%G1525><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> following <S%G190><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the tomb. <S%G3419><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G2334><s%> the linen cloths <S%G3608><s%> lying, <S%G2749><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> the cloth <S%G4676><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> had been <S%G2258><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head, <S%G2776><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lying <S%G2749><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the linen cloths, <S%G3608><s%> but <S%G235><s%> rolled up <S%G1794><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> a <S%G1520><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> by itself. <S%G5565><s%>

So <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> the <S%G3767><s%> other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the tomb <S%G3419><s%> also entered in, <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believed. <S%G4100><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as yet <S%G3764><s%> they didn't <S%G3764><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> the Scripture, <S%G1124><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
So <S%G3767><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> went away <S%G565><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> their own homes. <S%G1438><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the tomb <S%G3419><s%> weeping. <S%G2799><s%> So, <S%G3767><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> she wept, <S%G2799><s%> she stooped <S%G3879><s%> and looked into <S%G1519><s%> the tomb, <S%G3419><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> she saw <S%G2334><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> sitting, <S%G2516><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the head, <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the feet, <S%G4228><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had lain. <S%G2749><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G1565><s%> told <S%G3004><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G2799><s%> weeping? <S%G3004><s%>" She said to them, <S%G846><s%> "Because <S%G3754><s%> they have taken away <S%G142><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> they have laid <S%G5087><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> When she had <S%G2036><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5023><s%> she turned <S%G4762><s%> around <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3694><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G2334><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> standing, <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G2799><s%> weeping? <S%G5101><s%> Who are you <S%G2212><s%> looking for? <S%G1565><s%>" She, supposing <S%G1380><s%> <S%G3754><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> to be <S%G2076><s%> the gardener, <S%G2780><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Sir, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> have carried <S%G941><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away, <S%G941><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> you have laid <S%G5087><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and I <S%G2504><s%> will take <S%G142><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away. <S%G142><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Mary. <S%G3137><s%>" She turned <S%G1565><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Rabboni! <S%G4462><s%>" which <S%G3739><s%> is to say, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher! <S%G1320><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> hold <S%G680><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I haven't <S%G305><s%> yet <S%G3768><s%> ascended <S%G305><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father; <S%G3962><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G305><s%> 'I am ascending to <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> to <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>'"

Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> she had seen <S%G3708><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that he had said <S%G2036><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> to her. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G3767><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> it was evening, <S%G3798><s%> on that day, <S%G2250><s%> the first <S%G1520><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of the week, <S%G4521><s%> and when <S%G2532><s%> the doors <S%G2374><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> locked where <S%G3699><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> assembled, <S%G4863><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the midst, <S%G3319><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you. <S%G5213><s%>"

When he had <S%G5124><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he showed <S%G1166><s%> them <S%G846><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> side. <S%G4125><s%> The disciples <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> were <S%G5463><s%> glad <S%G5463><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> "Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you. <S%G5213><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> even so <S%G2504><s%> I <S%G3992><s%> send you. <S%G5209><s%>"

When <S%G2532><s%> he had said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he breathed on <S%G1720><s%> them, <S%G2532><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Receive <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit! <S%G4151><s%>

If you forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G99999><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%>'s sins, <S%G266><s%> they have been forgiven <S%G863><s%> them. <S%G846><s%> If you retain <S%G2902><s%> <S%G99999><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%>'s sins, <S%G2902><s%> they have been retained."

But <S%G1161><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> wasn't <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came. <S%G2064><s%>

The other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "We have seen <S%G3708><s%> the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>" But <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I see <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> the print <S%G5179><s%> of the nails, <S%G2247><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G906><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> side, <S%G4125><s%> I will <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> believe. <S%G4100><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> eight <S%G3638><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> inside, <S%G2080><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%> was with <S%G3326><s%> them. <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> the doors <S%G2374><s%> being locked, <S%G2808><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the midst, <S%G3319><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you. <S%G5213><s%>"

Then <S%G1534><s%> he <S%G3004><s%> said to Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> "Reach <S%G5342><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> finger, <S%G1147><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> hands. <S%G5495><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Reach here <S%G5342><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G906><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> side. <S%G4125><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> unbelieving, <S%G571><s%> but <S%G235><s%> believing. <S%G4103><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2381><s%> "Because <S%G3754><s%> you have seen <S%G3708><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> you have believed. <S%G4100><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are those who <S%G3588><s%> have <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> seen, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have believed. <S%G4100><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G99999><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> in the presence of <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> book; <S%G975><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are written, <S%G1125><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> believing <S%G4100><s%> you may have <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>
